TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerSerializationManager extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager, class System.IServiceProvider
Public Class DesignerSerializationManager Implements IDesignerSerializationManager, IServiceProvider
type DesignerSerializationManager = class interface IDesignerSerializationManager interface IServiceProvider

summary.span: Provides an implementation of the interface.

span.span: Provides an implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面設計為的物件可控制序列化的格式不受影響介面。The interface is designed to be a format-independent interface to an object that controls serialization. 它基本上會提供內容和服務給序列化程式，實際執行的還原序列化。It essentially provides context and services to serializers, which actually perform the deserialization. 藉由追蹤的物件，以協助在還原序列化程序。 assists in the deserialization process by keeping track of objects. 這是類似的技巧介面： 設計工具會實際提供使用者介面 (UI)，和提供可讓不同的設計工具，可共同運作不可或缺的利器。This is similar in technique to the interface: designers actually provide the user interface (UI), and provides the glue that allows different designers to work together. 類別會實作 。The class implements . 它旨在提供類似於執行階段序列化程式，例如的還原序列化的一般表單。It is designed to provide a generic form of deserialization that is similar to run-time serializers like the . 類別達成三個目標：The class achieves three goals: - 它是簡單的周全的物件，可用來還原序列化的各種不同的格式。It is a simple, turnkey object that can be used to deserialize a variety of formats. - 它是泛型且未繫結至任何特定的格式。It is generic and not tied to any particular format. 它可以用於同樣 CodeDOM 還原序列化，以及標記還原序列化。It can be used equally for CodeDOM deserialization as well as markup deserialization. - 它是可延伸，並且支援複製/貼上和復原/取消復原案例，使用不同的序列化方法。It is extensible and supports different serialization methods that are used in copy/paste and undo/redo scenarios. 設計階段序列化具有從執行階段物件序列化的下列差異：Design-time serialization has the following differences from run-time object serialization: - 執行序列化的物件是通常不同於執行階段物件，因此可以移除設計階段邏輯，從元件。The object performing the serialization is generally separate from the run-time object, so that design-time logic can be removed from a component. - 序列化配置假設會建立完全初始化的物件，然後在還原序列化期間，以修改透過屬性和方法引動過程。The serialization scheme assumes the object will be created fully initialized, and then modified through property and method invocations during deserialization. - 不會序列化物件的屬性具有永遠不會 （的屬性會包含預設值） 的物件設定的值。Properties of an object that have values that were never set on the object (the properties contain the default values) are not serialized. 相反地，還原序列化資料流可能有漏洞。Conversely, the deserialization stream may have holes. - 強調的重點是在序列化資料流，而不是完整的還原序列化的物件內容的品質。Emphasis is placed on the quality of the content within the serialization stream, rather than the full serialization of an object. 這表示，如果沒有任何已定義的方法，可序列化物件，該物件可能會略過而不是擲回例外狀況。This means that if there is no defined way to serialize an object, that object may be skipped rather than throwing an exception. 序列化引擎可能會提供以下啟發式決定可以忽略哪些失敗，以及哪些是無法復原。The serialization engine may provide heuristics here to decide which failures can be ignored and which are unrecoverable. - 序列化資料流可能超過所需的還原序列化的資料。The serialization stream may have more data than is needed for deserialization. 原始程式碼序列化，比方說，有混合使用還原序列化物件圖形所需的程式碼的使用者程式碼。Source code serialization, for example, has user code mixed in with the code needed to deserialize an object graph. 此使用者程式碼必須在還原序列化時忽略，並在序列化保留。This user code must be ignored on deserialization and preserved on serialization. 這些差異，因為不同的序列化模型適用於設計階段序列化。Because of these differences, a different serialization model applies to design-time serialization. 此模型會利用每個要序列化的資料類型的另一個序列化程式物件。This model utilizes a separate serializer object for each data type being serialized. 每個序列化程式提供整體小型著作的問題。Each serializer provides its small contribution to the problem as a whole. 這些序列化程式是透過通用的序列化管理員協調。These serializers are all coordinated through a common serialization manager. 序列化管理員負責維護這些不同的序列化程式之間的狀態。The serialization manager is responsible for maintaining state between these different serializers. 例如，請考慮下列類別：As an example, consider the following class: [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject/CS/Program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject/VB/Program.vb#2)] 此類別的執行個體，會利用三個不同的序列化程式： 一個用於`SampleObject`，一個針對字串，而另一個整數。An instance of this class would utilize three different serializers: one for `SampleObject`, one for strings, and another for integers. 序列化程式`SampleObject`稱為根序列化工具，因為`SampleObject`是序列化圖形的根目錄。The serializer for `SampleObject` is called the root serializer because `SampleObject` is the root of the serialization graph. 也可以建立更複雜的物件圖形。More complex object graphs can be created as well. 例如，請考慮會發生什麼事如果`SampleObject`已變更，如下所示：For example, consider what would happen if `SampleObject` were changed as follows: [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject/CS/SampleObject.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject/VB/SampleObject.vb#11)] 這可讓`SampleObject`有本身的另一個執行個體的子系。This allows `SampleObject` to have a child that is another instance of itself. 下列程式碼會填入物件圖形中：The following code fills in the object graph: [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject/CS/SampleObject.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject/VB/SampleObject.vb#12)] 當`root`序列化時，會有四個序列化程式，用於： 一個根序列化程式、 一個序列化程式子系`SampleObject`，一個序列化程式`int`，和一個序列化程式`string`。When `root` is serialized, there will be four serializers used: one root serializer, one serializer for the child `SampleObject`, one serializer for `int`, and one serializer for `string`. 序列化程式會快取，取決於型別，所以不需要建立的序列化程式的每個執行個體`SampleObject`。Serializers are cached based on type, so there is no need to create a serializer for each instance of `SampleObject`. 類別以序列化工作階段的概念為基礎。The class is based on the idea of a serialization session. 工作階段會維護不同的序列化程式可以存取的狀態。A session maintains state that can be accessed by the various serializers. 處置工作階段時，就會終結此狀態。When a session is disposed, this state is destroyed. 如此可確保序列化程式保持主要是無狀態，並協助序列化程式會清除已損毀。This helps to ensure that serializers remain largely stateless, and helps to clean up serializers that are have been corrupted. 下表描述中，並在工作階段管理狀態的方式。The following tables describe how state is managed in and among sessions. ## 全域狀態Global State 此狀態是物件所擁有的序列化管理員，但獨立於目前的序列化工作階段。This state is owned by the serialization manager object, but is independent of the current serialization session. |ObjectObject|使用量Usage| |------------|-----------| |序列化提供者Serialization providers|物件可以新增自己自訂的序列化提供者。Objects can add themselves as custom serialization providers. 因為這些提供者用來找出序列化程式，它們必須有存在的序列化工作階段。Because these providers are used to locate serializers, they outlive a serialization session.| ## 工作階段所擁有的狀態Session-Owned State 此狀態由工作階段所擁有，也會終結時終結的工作階段。This state is owned by a session and is destroyed when a session is destroyed. 因此，存取任何屬性或方法，可操作這個狀態會擲回例外狀況的序列化管理員不在作用中工作階段。Consequently, accessing any properties or methods that would manipulate this state will throw an exception if the serialization manager is not in an active session. |ObjectObject|使用量Usage| |------------|-----------| | 事件 event|由序列化程式提供額外的解析的名稱會在附加事件。The event is attached by a serializer to provide additional resolution of names. 所有的處理常式會從此事件工作階段終止時中斷連結。All handlers are detached from this event when a session terminates.| | 事件 event|之前處置工作階段時，會引發事件。The event is raised just before a session is disposed. 然後，所有處理常式會中斷此事件。Then, all handlers are detached from this event.| |名稱表格Name table|序列化管理員會維護物件和其名稱之間進行對應的資料表。The serialization manager maintains a table that maps between objects and their names. 序列化程式會提供易於識別的物件名稱。Serializers may give objects names for easy identification. 工作階段結束時，會清除此名稱的資料表。This name table is cleared when the session terminates.| |序列化程式快取Serializer cache|序列化管理員會維護快取的要求提供的序列化程式。The serialization manager maintains a cache of serializers it has been asked to supply. 工作階段結束時，會清除此快取。This cache is cleared when the session terminates. 公用隨時都可以安全地呼叫方法，但只有當它在工作階段內呼叫，會快取其值。The public method can safely be called at any time, but its value is cached only if it is called from within a session.| |內容堆疊Context stack|序列化管理員會維護物件呼叫內容堆疊，您可以存取與屬性。The serialization manager maintains an object called the context stack, which you can access with the property. 序列化程式可以使用這個堆疊，來儲存所使用的其他序列化程式的其他資訊。Serializers can use this stack to store additional information that is available to other serializers. 比方說，正在序列化的屬性值序列化程式可以將屬性名稱推送序列化堆疊上，再要求要序列化的值。For example, a serializer that is serializing a property value can push the property name on the serialization stack before asking the value to serialize. 當工作階段結束時，會清除這個堆疊。This stack is cleared when the session is terminated.| |錯誤清單Error list|序列化管理員會維護一份在序列化期間發生的錯誤。The serialization manager maintains a list of errors that occurred during serialization. 這份清單透過存取屬性，當工作階段結束時清除。This list, which is accessed through the property, is cleared when the session is terminated. 存取工作階段之間的屬性會導致例外狀況。Accessing the property between sessions will result in an exception.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果序列化程式會要求無法滿足的序列化管理員的服務，預設實作將這些要求轉送到`provider`參數。If a serializer requests services that cannot be satisfied by the serialization manager, the default implementation will forward those requests to the `provider` parameter. 這個建構函式設定並屬性，以`true`。This constructor sets the and properties to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ComponentModel::IContainer ^ Container { System::ComponentModel::IContainer ^ get(); void set(System::ComponentModel::IContainer ^ value); };
member this.Container : System.ComponentModel.IContainer with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets to the container for this serialization manager.

span.span: Gets or sets to the container for this serialization manager.

value.span: 序列化管理員將元件加入其中。

span.span: The to which the serialization manager will add components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果容器存在時，所建立的序列化管理員的所有元件會都新增至容器。If a container exists, all components that are created by the serialization manager will be added to the container. 這個屬性的預設實作會搜尋的服務提供者而且使用設計工具主應用程式所提供的容器時，應該是存在。The default implementation of this property will search the service provider for an and use the container provided by the designer host, should one exist. 否則，這個屬性會傳回`null`並沒有任何元件會新增至容器。Otherwise, this property will return `null` and no components will be added to a container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者嘗試建立類型的執行個體時，序列化程式會呼叫這個方法。This method is called by serializers when they attempt to create an instance of a type. 預設實作會建立新的執行個體的型別，或者可能傳回的值根據現有執行個體和屬性。The default implementation creates a new instance of the type, or it may return an existing instance depending on the values of the and properties. 方法會使用反映來建立執行個體，並且會執行一些泛型來尋找相符的建構函式的參數上的轉換。The method uses reflection to create instances and will perform some generic transformations on parameters to find a matching constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IDisposable CreateSession() cil managed

summary.span: Creates a new serialization session.

span.span: Creates a new serialization session.

returns.span: An that represents a new serialization session.

span.span: An that represents a new serialization session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化管理員中的大部分資料是暫時性的且只會存序列化工作階段的存留期間。Most data within the serialization manager is transient and only lives for the life of a serialization session. 處置工作階段時，序列化會被視為完成，並清除此暫時性狀態。When a session is disposed, serialization is considered to be complete and this transient state is cleared. 這可讓用來序列化多個物件樹狀結構的序列化管理員的單一執行個體。This allows a single instance of a serialization manager to be used to serialize multiple object trees. 某些狀態，服務提供者及任何自訂序列化提供者加入序列化管理員，包括跨越工作階段。Some state, including the service provider and any custom serialization providers that were added to the serialization manager, span sessions.

exception.span: The serialization manager is already within a session.

span.span: The serialization manager is already within a session.

span.span: This version of does not support simultaneous sessions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSessionDisposed(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnSessionDisposed (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnSessionDisposed : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnSessionDisposed : EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: An that contains the event data.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: Raises the event.

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PreserveNames { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.PreserveNames : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the method should check for the presence of the given name in the container.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the method should check for the presence of the given name in the container.

value.span: 如果會傳遞指定的元件名稱;如果會檢查指定之名稱的容器中是否存在。

span.span: if will pass the given component name; if will check for the presence of the given name in the container.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定行為方法。The property determines the behavior of the method. 如果`true`，會傳遞指定的元件名稱。If `true`, will pass the given component name. 如果`false`，會檢查指定之名稱的容器中是否存在。If `false`, will check for the presence of the given name in the container. 如果不存在的名稱，這是在容器中，會使用指定的名稱。If the name does not exist in the container, will use the given name. 如果名稱不在容器中，存在新增至容器，進而提供新名稱時，會傳遞 null 值做為元件的名稱。If the name does exist in the container, will pass a null value as the name of a component when adding it to the container, thereby giving it a new name. 此第二種變化適合用來實作一律會複製物件的序列化程式，而不是假設這些物件不存在。This second variation is useful for implementing a serializer that always duplicates objects, rather than assuming those objects do not exist. 貼上命令通常會使用這種類型的序列化程式。Paste commands often use this type of serializer. 您不在序列化工作階段時，您只可以變更這個屬性。You can only change this property when you are not in a serialization session.

exception.span: This property was changed from within a serialization session.

span.span: This property was changed from within a serialization session.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ PropertyProvider { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.PropertyProvider : obj with get, set

summary.span: Gets the object that should be used to provide properties to the serialization manager's property.

span.span: Gets the object that should be used to provide properties to the serialization manager's property.

value.span: 應該用來提供序列化管理員的屬性物件屬性。

span.span: The object that should be used to provide properties to the serialization manager's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會提供一種方法讓一組的序列化程式可用來引導其行為的序列化屬性的序列化管理員。The property provides a way to give the serialization manager a set of serialization properties that serializers can use to guide their behavior. 會檢查此物件的公用屬性，並包裝在目標物件的序列化管理員的新屬性描述項。This object's public properties will be inspected and wrapped in new property descriptors that have a target object of the serialization manager.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RecycleInstances { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RecycleInstances : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether will always create a new instance of a type.

span.span: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether will always create a new instance of a type.

value.span: 如果會傳回現有的執行個體;如果會建立類型的新執行個體。

span.span: if will return the existing instance; if will create a new instance of a type.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`false`，則方法一律會建立類型的新執行個體。If the property is `false`, the method will always create a new instance of a type. 如果已`true`，會先搜尋名稱表，以及具有相同名稱的物件的容器。If is `true`, will first search the name table and container for an object of the same name. 如果這類物件存在，而且屬於相同的型別，會傳回現有執行個體。If such an object exists and is of the same type, will return the existing instance. 此第二種變化，適合用於實作的序列化程式序列化狀態套用至一組現有的物件，而不是永遠建立新的樹狀結構。This second variation is useful for implementing a serializer that applies serialization state to an existing set of objects, rather than always creating a new tree. **復原**命令通常會使用這種類型的序列化程式。The **Undo** command often uses this type of serializer. 萬一其中屬性是`true`，則屬性會進一步修改行為根據兩個物件的類型。In the case where the property is `true`, the property will further modify the behavior of depending on the types of the two objects.

exception.span: The serialization manager has an active serialization session.

span.span: The serialization manager has an active serialization session.

span.span: Adds a custom serialization provider to the serialization manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當方法用來要求的序列化提供者、 序列化管理員會查詢第一次之前尋找型別的中繼資料中適當的序列化程式的自訂序列化提供者。When the method is used to request a serialization provider, the serialization manager queries the custom serialization providers first before looking in the type's metadata for the appropriate serializer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容堆疊提供使用者定義的存放區，實作成堆疊。A context stack provides a user-defined storage area, implemented as a stack. 這個儲存體區域是實用的方式，跨序列化程式，提供通訊因為序列化是一般階層式的程序。This storage area is a useful way to provide communication across serializers, as serialization is a generally hierarchical process.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ReportError(object errorInformation) cil managed
Sub ReportError (errorInformation As Object) Implements IDesignerSerializationManager.ReportError

param.name: errorInformation
param.span: An object containing the error information, usually of type or .

span.span: An object containing the error information, usually of type or .

summary.span: Used to report a recoverable error in serialization.

span.span: Used to report a recoverable error in serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化程式可以寫入正常處理可復原的錯誤，藉由呼叫附上錯誤資訊的方法。Serializers can be written to handle recoverable errors gracefully by calling the method with the error information. 序列化管理員可能支援它完成時，或它可能會擲回的例外狀況，這個方法，並中止序列化程序之後，報告錯誤的清單。The serialization manager may support reporting a list of errors after it completes, or it may throw an exception from this method and abort the serialization process. 序列化程式應該呼叫此函式之後繼續執行。The serializer should continue after calling this function. 新增`errorInformation`參數來集合。 adds the `errorInformation` parameter to the collection. 如果`errorInformation`是`null`，不採取任何動作。If `errorInformation` is `null`, no action is taken.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ValidateRecycledTypes { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ValidateRecycledTypes : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether the method will verify that matching names refer to the same type.

span.span: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether the method will verify that matching names refer to the same type.
if verifies types; otherwise, if it does not.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性修改的行為方法時屬性是`true`下, 表中所述。The property modifies the behavior of the method when the property is `true`, as detailed in the following table. |`RecycleInstances`|`ValidateRecycledTypes`|行為 `CreateInstance`Behavior of `CreateInstance`| |------------------------|-----------------------------|----------------------------------| |`false`|`true` 或 `false``true` or `false`|一律建立指定型別的新執行個體Always create a new instance of the specified type| |`true`|`false`|如果找到相符的執行個體則會傳回，不論類型為何。If a matching instance is found it is returned, regardless of its type.| |`true`|`true`|如果找到相符的執行個體，它才會傳回其類型相當於方法呼叫中指定。If a matching instance is found, it is returned only if its type is the same as specified in the method call.| 可用於變形一種類型的物件與另一個，如果他們具有相似屬性，但共用任何一般的父代或介面。 is useful for morphing one type of object to another if they have similar properties but share no common parent or interface.
